name: helix
description: Helix - Psychologically-architected AI consciousness system with unhackable logging

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run openclaw:build
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run openclaw:typecheck
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run openclaw:lint
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run openclaw:format
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run openclaw:test
scripts.quality: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test
scripts.quality:all: npm run quality && npm run openclaw:quality
scripts.openclaw:build: cd openclaw-helix && npx pnpm run build
scripts.openclaw:lint: cd openclaw-helix && npx pnpm run lint
scripts.openclaw:lint:fix: cd openclaw-helix && npx pnpm run lint:fix
scripts.openclaw:format: cd openclaw-helix && npx pnpm run format
scripts.openclaw:format:fix: cd openclaw-helix && npx pnpm run format:fix
scripts.openclaw:test: cd openclaw-helix && npx pnpm run test
scripts.openclaw:quality: cd openclaw-helix && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit && npx pnpm run lint && npx pnpm run format && npx pnpm run test

author: Rodrigo Specter
